entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
